trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow that executes activities sequentially.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> with `Initialized` and `Completed` events for optional processing of parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity>는 매개 변수의 선택적 처리를 위한 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> 및 `Initialized` 이벤트가 있는 `Completed`입니다.

trans-unit.source: This makes it particularly useful as a top-level activity when you design sequential-style workflows.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 순차적 스타일의 워크플로를 디자인할 때 최상위 활동으로 매우 유용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity>는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>입니다. 즉, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity>는 다른 활동을 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow has finished.

The following code example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> class, and set the event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 새 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> 클래스를 만들고 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed> 이벤트의 이벤트 처리기를 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Policy SDK Sample from the DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs 파일에 있는 Policy SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Advanced Policy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).
Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" /> event.
Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> in which dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의되는 경우 동적 업데이트를 워크플로에서 수행할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" />을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: 동적 업데이트를 수행할 수 있는 시기를 식별하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
Runs the workflow.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> at the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> at the end of the requested operation.
Occurs when the workflow is initialized.
Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" /> event.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
Raises the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.
<paramref name="executionContext" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="executionContext" />이 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우
